es_first_half: Paul sintió sus propias tensiones y decidió practicar uno de los ejercicios corporales-mentales que le había enseñado su madre. Tres rápidas inspiraciones desencadenaron las respuestas: entró en estado de percepción flotante... ajustó su conciencia... dilatación aórtica... alejamiento de todo mecanismo no focalizado... concienciación deliberada... enriquecimiento de la sangre e irrigación de las regiones sobrecargadas... nadie obtiene alimento-seguridad-libertad sólo con el instinto... La consciencia animal no se extiende más allá de un momento dado, como tampoco admite la posibilidad de la extinción
es_second_half: de sus victimas... el animal destruye y no produce... los placeres animales permanecen encerrados en el nivel de las sensaciones sin alcanzar la percepción... el ser humano necesita una escala graduada a través de la cual poder ver el universo... una consciencia selectivamente focalizada, esto forma su escala... La integridad del cuerpo depende del flujo nervioso-sanguíneo, sensible a las necesidades de cada una de las células... todos los seres/células/cosas son no permanentes... todo lucha para mantener el flujo de la permanencia...

en_second_half: side. She turned it and Paul saw that one side was open—black and oddly frightening. No light penetrated that open blackness.
en_Completion: side. The cube was covered in strange symbols and markings that seemed to shift and change as she turned it in her hand. "It's said to hold the key to unlocking the secrets of their technology and magic."

en_first_half: “I see in the future what I’ve seen in the past. You well know the pattern of our affairs, Jessica. The race knows its own mortality and fears stagnation of its heredity.
en_second_half: It’s in the bloodstream—the urge to mingle genetic strains without plan. The Imperium, the CHOAM Company, all the Great Houses, they are but bits of flotsam in the path of the flood.”
en_Completion: It is in the blood, the flesh, that the ultimate test of humankind is to be found. And it is the blood, the flesh, that the Bene Gesserit have always sought to control. The breeding program, the careful selection of mates, the manipulation of genes - all of these are aimed at one goal: the creation of the Kwisatz Haderach, the super-being who will bring about the next step in human evolution.

vi_Completion: ảnh hưởng bởi những yếu tố di truyền. Nhưng ta không thể thay đổi được điều đó, Jessica. Dòng giống loài người đã được định hình từ hàng nghìn năm nay, và ta không thể thay đổi được điều đó chỉ trong một sớm một chiều. Ta chỉ có thể cố gắng hiểu và chấp nhận nó."

en_Completion: was a deliberate attempt to maintain a level of humidity within the homes, as the native Fremen had long ago learned to do in their sietches, hidden away beneath the desert's surface. Leto had explained that the Fremen's ability to survive in the harsh environment of Arrakis was a key factor in

en_second_half: a watershipper whose summer mansion was near his polar-cap factory, a representative of the Guild Bank (lean and remote, that one), a dealer in replacement parts for spice mining equipment, a thin and hard-faced woman whose escort service for off-planet visitors reputedly operated as cover for various smuggling, spying, and blackmail operations.

en_Completion: in a swimming pool. The drowning man who climbs on your shoulders to save himself in a swimming pool is not understandable. It is not understandable because it is not a natural or instinctual behavior for a person to climb on someone else's shoulders to save themselves in a swimming pool. In a swimming pool, there are usually lifeguards and other safety measures in place to prevent drowning, and it is not necessary for someone to climb on someone else's shoulders to save themselves. en_first_half: It annoyed Gurney, the cunning and adroitness in battle of these natives. They displayed a sophistication in warfare as good as anything he had
en_second_half: ever encountered, and he had been trained by the best fighters in the universe then seasoned in battles where only the superior few survived.
en_Completion: seen in his own people, and he couldn't help but feel a twinge of admiration for their skill and strategy. The way they utilized the terrain to their advantage, employing guerrilla tactics and clever ambushes, was a testament to their resourcefulness and cunning. Gurney's own troops, despite their superior numbers and firepower, were struggling to keep up with the natives' lightning-fast movements and unpredictable attacks. It was as if the very land itself was working against them,

es_second_half: había encontrado, él que había sido adiestrado por los mejores combatientes del universo antes de participar en batallas donde tan sólo sobrevivían los más fuertes.
es_Completion: había visto antes. Sus tácticas eran impredecibles y parecían anticipar cada movimiento de los soldados. Gurney se preguntaba cómo podrían enfrentar semejante adversario sin sufrir pérdidas significativas. La moral de sus hombres comenzaba a decaer, y sabía que debía encontrar una solución rápida para revertir la situación.
